name: MENA Card Holdings Limited
description: SimpliFi is on a mission to democratize payments by building the leading Cards as a Service (CaaS) platform for MENA and Pakistan. We empower brands to unlock the power of financial ownership by enabling them to issue payment cards to streamline business operations and drive new revenue streams.
one_liner: SimpliFi is on a mission to democratize payments by building the leading Cards as a Service (CaaS) platform for MENA and Pakistan. We empower brands to unlock the power of financial ownership by enabling them to issue payment cards to streamline business operations and drive new revenue streams.
